title: Katharine McPhee highlights her famous figure in a khaki dress for a night out with David Foster
text:
She's still basking in that newlywed glow more than four months after becoming a wife.

And Katharine McPhee looked absolutely flawless for a night out with husband David Foster, 69, in Los Angeles.

The 35-year-old singer highlighted her figure in a chic khaki-colored dress to preview The Royal Atlantis Residences in Dubai with her musician beau.

Beautiful : Katharine McPhee looked absolutely flawless for a night out with husband David Foster, 69, in Los Angeles

Katharine was dressed to impress for the star-studded soiree in the Hollywood Hills with Mod Sélection Champagne.

Her tan dress featured thick lapels which rested across her shoulders and showcased a plunging neckline.

A host of golden buttons ran vertically down her body with pockets resting below her hips.

Ready to travel? The 35-year-old singer highlighted her figure in a chic khaki-colored dress to preview The Royal Atlantis Residences in Dubai with her musician beau

Good times: Katharine was dressed to impress for the star-studded soiree in the Hollywood Hills with Mod Sélection Champagne

She wore a solitary gold choker necklace with a matching pair of hoop earrings, and carried a black leather bag by her side.

The Waitress star parted her straight, chocolate brown hair down the middle, with tendrils cascading down her back.

David wore his usual attire of jeans with a white button down shirt and added a vest to match his navy blue blazer.

The couple were also joined by his former step-daughter, Alana Hadid and Josh Altman for a night of luxurious taste with Nobu Executive Chef Gregorio Stephenson.

Friends: The couple were also joined by his former step-daughter, Alana Hadid and Josh Altman for a night of luxurious taste with Nobu Executive Chef Gregorio Stephenson

David and Katharine said 'I do' in front of nearly 100 guests at their London wedding in June, including David's two daughters, Sarah and Erin, who he shares with ex-wife Rebecca Dyer.

Katharine was previously married to Nick Cokas between 2008 and 2016. Interestingly, David played the piano at their wedding.

David has been married four times and has five daughters and seven grandchildren. His last marriage to Yolanda Hadid came to an end in 2017.
description: The 35-year-old singer highlighted her figure in a chic khaki-colored dress to preview The Royal Atlantis Residences in Dubai with her musician beau.
